headline: Illinois Tool Works (ITW): Evaluating Valuation After BofA Upgrade and Brighter Profit Outlook for 2026
summary: BofA just upgraded Illinois Tool Works (ITW) to neutral, citing a brighter profit outlook and higher margins for 2026. The shift in analyst sentiment is drawing fresh attention to the company’s earnings potential. See our latest analysis for Illinois Tool Works. ITW’s share price has rebounded 2.77% in the past day following the upbeat profit outlook, partially reversing its recent 8% three-month slide. Despite some volatility, the company’s five-year total shareholder return stands at nearly...
